title: MarketWatch - The Darker Side of Money: Banks and Regulation
description: MarketWatch financial crime reporter Lukas Alpert is joined by K2 Integrity Managing Director Ray Dookhie to discuss the latest in what financial institutions are doing to battle fraud and stay in regulatory compliance in a fast-changing world.
itunes:author: Barron's Live
itunes:summary: MarketWatch financial crime reporter Lukas Alpert is joined by K2 Integrity Managing Director Ray Dookhie to discuss the latest in what financial institutions are doing to battle fraud and stay in regulatory compliance in a fast-changing world.
